GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.15.76
GSD.description:
tipc: fix an information leak in tipc_topsrv_kern_subscr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.76 by commit dbc01c0a4e202a7e925dad1d4b7c1d6eb0c81154, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 026321c6d056a54b4145522492245d2b5913ee1d. For more details please see the references link.
